name: User to Galette Exporter
author: Jud Alex

sections.description: User to Galette Exporter is a plug-in that synchronise users from WordPress with Galette users. See http://galette.eu for more explanation about Galette.
sections.installation:
1. Upload User to Galette Exporter directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The plugin can manage galette users if they are on the same bdd that wordpress (with “galette_” prefix) or on an external bdd (host form in the panel)
